ABOUT.TITLE: About Me
ABOUT.CONTENT:
I worked as a front-end engineer at a bank for two years, focusing on building internal form systems using Angular. I collaborated closely with designers and back-end engineers to ensure functionality stability and UI consistency. This experience helped me develop strong communication skills and a steady delivery mindset, with a user-centered approach to development.

Currently, I‚Äôm deepening my knowledge in modern front-end tools such as RxJS, Signal, and NgRx, while gradually building my portfolio and technical confidence through side projects.

To me, being a reliable engineer means more than keeping up with new technologies ‚Äî it‚Äôs about delivering with care, growing continuously, and getting things done right.

I'm now open to new front-end engineering opportunities. If you‚Äôre looking for a dedicated, responsible, and growth-oriented teammate, feel free to reach out!

DETAILS: Developed internal enterprise systems using Angular, TypeScript, and RxJS; responsible for form validation and data handling to ensure functional stability and a smooth user flow.
Optimized CI/CD pipelines with external config and configMap integration, reducing deployment errors by 67%; contributed to defining development standards and component validation procedures.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers via Figma and wrote technical documentation and SOPs to support team knowledge sharing and project handovers.
Established design guidelines and reusable UI components to ensure product consistency and support cross-team development efficiency.
Designed user flows, wireframes, and prototypes to improve interaction logic and product usability.
Collaborated with international teams to design marketing assets for new product launches, resulting in a 20% increase in social media engagement.
Responsible for recruitment, employee training, and cross-department project coordination.
